divs: Sighting Detailswas having a cigarette in the outside break area at work. was looking up. saw avery fast, brown, arrow-headed shaped object pass overhead from sw to ne. sofast that i almost didnt give it a second thought until I saw what I thought atfirst to be a childs silver helium balloon. after watching the balloon for asecond or two i realized that a balloon would not be visable at this apparentaltitude 30,000-35,000 ft. The shimmering silver balloon craft made highlydexterious movements not capable by aircraft or balloon while following the samepath(and was following exact trajectory of the first object.). I really did notknow what to think after seeing this.
Summary: Large brown arrow shaped craft followed by silver
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Moorpark
There were no other sightings in Moorpark on or around January 24th 2001
